locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: We‚Äôve been using the same app barcode for showers with my co-driver/brother without any issues. However, tonight a rude staff member refused to accept it, insisting that I had to bring my brothers phone and use app to scan the barcode. This ‚Ä¶

Cold Showers.. stood in there 30 mins trying to get running hot water but absolutely nothing but cold. End up having to take a bath in the sink since the sink was running hot water. I informed front desk worker white girl with dark hair and ‚Ä¶

Reason for a 2 star rating is , I stopped at this location on 9/3/24 for a layover and went inside to grab a shower and something to eat. Had an issue with the shower assigned to me not taking the code so I asked the staff at the fuel desk ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and beating on my door like she was the police with a warrant, then threatening to have me towed. I fueled up, took a shower, and did some shopping and not one person in that store could even crack a smile And that is sad I used to work for ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ two dozen local bobtail drivers around the clock. Take your business somewhere else where you're appreciated and there'd at least be a spot for you to park long enough to get a meal or a shower. Thanks for wasting my time, Love's, it's not ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ .  They were more then helpful. I stopped in last night for my break of 10 hours and this morning I went in to take a shower. I had asked if they would let me bring my rescue in so that I could give him a bath and explained why. Before ‚Ä¶

Love's travel stop convenience stores have all your needs for trucking and traveling.
A great place to find unique souvenirs and get a quick shower when you're on the road for many miles.

Worst loves in entire U.S. The fat lady upfront at desk didnt let me use the shower yesterday. I had my loves card added in my apple wallet. Didnt had my physical card with me. She said u have to have physical card in order to reserve ‚Ä¶

Chunky Lady with the yellow stained teeth at the customer service counter or shower counter has no customer service skills nor the way it looks no people skills neither. Not going to explain the situation because Loves corporate dont give a ‚Ä¶
Showers were exceptionally clean and we got a towel with the shower. Carlee was so nice and helpful! Actually all the staff was amazing. Very nice blonde girl too. Highly recommended

locations.title: 83 Travel Plaza
locations.content: 83 Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Truckers and patrons should try this place good food decent price trucker free parking with purchase of food and times they have showers and laundry very clean bathrooms clean ‚Ä¶

Great diner.  Great pizza place as well.  Pay to park for Semis or eat inside and that will cover the parking.  Showers and Laundry available as well.  Also, they do check at night to see if you paid!

I loved my stop here so much, all kinds of food...here in travel center and in diner next door. Prices are great and affordable...showers are clean and the have washer and dryers available, a ATM machine as well. Your shower purchase goes ‚Ä¶

The staff working this evening is very helpful. Paid parking but free with purchases. We ordered a large Hawaiian pizza and it was delicious.  Clean restrooms and showers. Definitely recommend this place to anyone in the area needing food, parking, and or shower.

I did not try there food, but did need to grab a quick shower before heading towards the west coast.  I'm pretty sure there are substances on the shower floor unknown to modern science!  I mean good grief if the showers are any indication of how clean there food prep area is well make your own decisions.

locations.title: TA Express Lancaster Travel Plaza
locations.content: TA Express Lancaster Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: My shower experience was awesome. Whoever runs this place is smart. That's how you sell products by placing them where Truckers use them. I actually bought one of these body washes because they had in the shower and it smelled so good! ‚Ä¶
They don‚Äôt wash towels in between use shower number one had all three towels, wet and dirty from the previous person put back on the rack.

‚Ä¶ for 24 hrs. I found him funny to because when I asked how much to park he said with that unique accent 12.00 I said okay, and asked if they had showers he again said 12.00, I began to think everything is 12.00..lol..If you need a ‚Ä¶

Taking a shower is an ice cold experience the water surgeons from pressure to no pressure from hot to cold it's not a good experience the people there are cool but unfortunately so are the showers and when I mean cool I mean cold
Do you have to pay for parking if you're just stopping in and taking a shower? ‚Ä¶

After spending $250 on diesel ,i I wanted to get a shower and breakfast, but i had to take my businesses somewhere else because the attendant will not grant me 2 hr parking to take care of my businesses. That's a low blow to a driver from ‚Ä¶
Large, clean shower. Lots of variety for hot meals (Pizza Hut, Subway, fried chicken, Indian food). Prizes are reasonable considering it is a truck stop. Paid parking but large spots. Nice dog area.

Assigned shower 1 through the app. Walk in and open the shower‚Ä¶FILTHY. The previous users used washcloth and towels were in the shower and on the toilet. I went up to the front to request a different shower that would be clean. The guy ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ reasonable. Moreover, they provide excellent food services, offering fresh and delicious meals. This establishment is particularly favored by truckers due to the availability of shower facilities and well-maintained, clean surroundings.
excellent service, cleaned shower great staff

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a bad spot to stop big truck parking nice people and decent food what more can you ask maybe a shower lol but overall 4‚≠êÔ∏è
Very friendly staff. Restaurant on site; truck scale, fuel and all necessities. Showers are similar to a camp ground but are free with the purchase of a shower. I will return on my next trip.

Nice staff
Clean shower &restroom

locations.title: Martin's Trailside Express
locations.content: Martin's Trailside Express may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This place went downhill when turkey hill took over.  Used to have the cleanest showers around... Just used and the shower looked like it hasn't been cleaned in a long time... Old soap on the shelf in the shower, trash can full and black ‚Ä¶

Lots of ICE CREAM in the cooler if that‚Äôs your thing. They do have a couple showers, they were updated with glass doors and clean at the time I stopped in. I have posted the shower prices and a few photos of the coolers.  Be safe out there ‚Ä¶
Nice little spot tucked away when the big chain truck stops are packed. Having shower is a bonus

‚Ä¶ then breakfast this morning. Nothin so amazing that I would come back for..  Definitely a clean facility, didn't take shower but restrooms were clean. Also keep in mind this Pennsylvania and they have the no idle signs everywhere, local ‚Ä¶
Payed 12 bucks for a shower only to find they don't clean between uses, it was flat nasty plus the door wudnt latch shut.
Decent place to rest and shower, no food.  Homeless people are making this place look trashy with their old UGLY looking mobile homes .
Nice Clean showers best food East of the Mississippi especially for a fuel stop polite happy employees stop in twice a week for grub and shower
Nice & great truck stop clean shower friendly people l‚ÄôM Recommend üíØ ‚Ä¶
Good food and very nice shower thnks

Very beautiful location..as well as shower..

locations.title: Blue Mountain Travel Plaza
locations.content: Blue Mountain Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped to gas up and use the restrooms. It was okay. A lot cleaner inside and outside than the other location along route 276 West. Ladies restroom wasn‚Äôt too bad. It was clean enough to actually use the toilet. It was early in the morning ‚Ä¶

We got there about 7pm. Auntie annes was shut dosn, sbarro shut down, bathrooms filthy, and only iptions were roy rogers that was out of alot of stuff and starbucks. 711 had aandwhiches but no way to heat them up.

These travel plazas provide one with just about anything one would need on a road trip. From gas to convenience store items, to fast foods, they have it all. One can either sit inside to enjoy one's meal, or outside. The bathrooms are ‚Ä¶

On the way to our vacation we took a short break in this service plaza. It is nice, clean and roomy. Not too crowded yet the 7-11 location could be little more spacious or should have been more organized to make more rooms for the visitors. ‚Ä¶
Lots of parking. Clean rest rooms. Decent array of fast food choices. Beware of typical inflated turnpike prices.
Small plaza but it offers food and snacks.  It has a Roy Rogers and a Starbucks.  The bathrooms were clean. Handicap push buttons for the entry and exit doors.
The main building has never been opened anytime i have stopped there.  Toilets are clean but basic

locations.description: Set beside a service station, this low-key place prepares burgers, subs & pizza.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This was on the floor in the shower #14. It completely grossed me out considering it was cleaned before I used it. I think this is unacceptable. I showed the cashier and to compensate, she gave me a free coffee. Lets get it together, this ‚Ä¶

For the last two months I been running a dedicated run and this is the place I stop at just about every night. I shower every morning here. Everytime I showered it was always very clean. The staff is always friendly wheather at night or ‚Ä¶
Clean, lots of parking, workout, food omg. Only  problem shower was cold but for a high traffic time this place is on point.. pilot/flying take notes.

‚Ä¶ , no load board, nothing.  But on the brighter side,  guys at the shop were professional and knowledgeable getting a part we needed. Shower was very clean with a lot of hot water and excellent pressure. Gentlman back in the shower area ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ All of the cardio equipment is broken, and the cable machine has very few attachments for many worthwhile exercises. So I decided to take my shower and the hot water is cold. TA/Petro please pull it together for your drivers health needs. ‚Ä¶

Good place to rest , refuel , relax , shower , eat, play some slots , ECT . Most of the time I get lucky and win . Nice people , ord hours though on the game room. Id call ahead if planning to come to play slots ..

‚Ä¶ little fly problem at the food counter. Might want to look into that. The shower was ok. I had to clean my sink before I could use it. food I purchased at the fuel desk was good could have been hotter. Overall not bad for my first time here ‚Ä¶
Came in this evening to eat, shower, and kill a few hours before heading to Charlotte. ‚Ä¶

I have stopped for gas and showers two nights in a row while driving, from AR to RI, at two different TAs. Both TAs were staffed by friendly/helpful people. The restroom and shower rooms were clean and well stocked. Well worth the money!

The place is clean and the people are friendly. Everything else sucks. Barely any cell service, $22 for parking, only like 20 spots are free, Everything else is pay. $15 for a shower. TA is ripping off truck drivers every chance they get.
